Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic text: 17 ll. on recto and 13 ll. on verso. Omen text concerning the movement of a sacred scarab beetle. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Narration of a dream(?) Petition to Osorapis. Date. year 21 Payni 10 of an unnamed King (Ptol. Philometor?)".
Curator's comments: Published: R Jasnow in Fs. te Velde, 1997, p207. Published Revillout. Corp.Pap. II. pl.VI and rev.eg.V 24. Published by Depauw, The Demotic Letter (2006), 354 with proposed new readings. Quack, J.F. 2022. Altägyptische Amulette und ihre Handhabung. Orientalische Religionen in der Antike 31. Tübingen, p. 162.
Bibliographic references: Revillout 1888 / Papyrus Démotiques du British Museum, Premier Fascicule (p.4, pl.6)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (48745) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/48745)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Inlaid: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
